@@ -90,1 +90,1 @@
-	   $(INCLUDES) \
+           $(INCLUDES) \
@@ -112,0 +112,6 @@
+# Enables reproducible builds when defined
+ifdef SOURCE_DATE_EPOCH
+    CFLAGS += -experimental:deterministic
+    LDFLAGS += -experimental:deterministic
+endif
